title: Risk Limits Dashboard
prompt: Create a comprehensive risk monitoring dashboard. Four gauge meters in a 2x2 grid: Top-left 'Daily Risk Used' (0-3%, currently 1.5%, yellow zone at 2%, red at 3%), Top-right 'Open Positions' (0-3, currently 2, with position icons), Bottom-left 'Weekly Drawdown' (0-10%, currently 4%, showing this week's P&L), Bottom-right 'Consecutive Losses' (0-5, currently 1, with loss streak counter). Center: Account equity chart (mini line graph) showing daily balance. Right panel: Active position cards showing symbol, direction, current P&L. Alert banner at top if any limit approaching. Dark slate background (#1E293B). Red/yellow/green color coding for risk levels. Trading cockpit aesthetic.
negative_prompt: too many metrics, overlapping gauges, hard to read values, inconsistent gauge styles
